title-group.article-title: Auflösung des Sozialen?: Die Verflüssigung des soziologischen „Gegenstandes” im Fortgang der soziologischen Theorie

abstract.p: Three different concepts of the subject of sociology considera to be dominant in sociological thinking are discussed: the ,socia' as an external, as an internal, and as a serial structure. Comparing these concepts the notion of social structures seems to be dissolving: from a desubstantialization and desubjectivation to a destructuralization and detotalization of the ,social'. This raises the question of the end of sociology.
